chat.name: Microsoft Copilot
chat.description: Offers strong overall performance and can access the internet for information retrieval. (Free plan available with limited features, paid plans for extended functionality)

chat.name: ChatGPT
chat.description: A popular choice known for its text-based conversational abilities. (Free tier with limitations, paid plans for increased usage and features)

chat.name: Perplexity AI
chat.description: Designed for easy use and provides sources for its responses. Free plan with limitations, paid plans for increased functionality

chat.name: Chat by Copy.ai
chat.description: Integrates with a text editor for creative writing workflows. Free plan with limitations, paid plans for increased functionality

chat.name: Mitsuku
chat.description: Award-winning chatbot known for its wit and personality. Free to chat with, paid API access available

chat.name: Cleverbot
chat.description: A long-running chatbot that learns from user interactions. Free to chat with, limited API access

chat.name: Juiceplus+
chat.description: Health and wellness focused chatbot offering information and support. Free to chat with

chat.name: Bard (Google AI)
chat.description: Large language model from Google AI, focused on factual language and informative answers. Currently in research phase, not publicly available for chat yet

chat.name: Dialogflow (Google Cloud)
chat.description: Platform for building chatbots with pre-built integrations. Free tier with limitations, paid plans for increased functionality

chat.name: Amazon Lex
chat.description: AWS offering for building conversational AI applications. Free tier with limitations, paid plans for increased functionality

chat.name: Wit.ai (Facebook)
chat.description: Facebook's platform for building voice-powered applications (partially discontinued, focus shifted to Messenger chatbots). Free plan with limitations

chat.name: IBM Watson Assistant
chat.description: Cloud-based service for building intelligent virtual assistants. Free tier with limitations, paid plans for increased functionality

chat.name: Botpress
chat.description: Open-source platform for building chatbots with a focus on conversational flows. Free to use, requires development expertise

image.name: DALL-E 2 (OpenAI)
image.description: Renowned for its ability to generate unique and creative images based on text descriptions. Currently in closed beta with limited access.

image.name: Midjourney
image.description: Known for its ability to produce high-quality and artistic images. Operates through a waitlist system and offers paid subscriptions.

image.name: Dream by WOMBO
image.description: A user-friendly tool that allows generating images with various artistic styles from simple text prompts. Offers both free and paid plans.

image.name: Nightcafe Creator
image.description: Provides a good range of customization options for creating both abstract and realistic images based on text descriptions. Offers free and paid plans.

image.name: Imagen by Google AI
image.description: Still under development, but known for its potential to generate high-fidelity and photorealistic images. Public access is not yet available.

image.name: Craiyon (DALL-E Mini)
image.description: A free-to-use tool that generates images based on text prompts, although the quality may not be as high as some paid options.

image.name: Jasper Art
image.description: Primarily focused on creating visuals for marketing and advertising purposes. Offers paid subscriptions with different feature sets.

image.name: Canva
image.description: Offers a limited image generation tool within its design platform. Free and paid plans available.

image.name: Adobe Photoshop (Beta feature)
image.description: Exploring the integration of AI image generation functionalities within the popular editing software.

image.name: Deep Dream Generator
image.description: Web application that allows applying various artistic styles to images using deep learning techniques. Free to use with limitations, paid plans for extended functionalities.

image.name: Artbreeder
image.description: Platform for creating and exploring artistic variations of images using machine learning. Free to use with limitations, paid plans for extended functionalities.

music.name: Amper Music
music.description: Creates high-quality musical pieces in various genres using artificial intelligence. Offers a free trial and paid subscriptions.

music.name: AIVA
music.description: Generates original music soundtracks and sound effects for media projects. Offers paid subscriptions with varying functionalities.

music.name: MuseNet (OpenAI)
music.description: An open-source music generation tool that can create MIDI files in various styles. Free to use and modify.

music.name: Soundful
music.description: Generates royalty-free background music for videos, social media content, and other creative projects. Offers free and paid plans.

music.name: Jukebox (OpenAI)
music.description: A research project by OpenAI that can generate music in different styles, mimicking various artists. Public access is limited.

music.name: Landr
music.description: Uses AI to analyze and master your music tracks, enhancing their audio quality. Offers free trials and paid plans.

music.name: iZotope Ozone
music.description: An industry-standard audio mastering software with AI features for intelligent processing and mastering suggestions. Offers paid subscriptions.

music.name: Melodyo
music.description: A web-based music creation tool that helps users compose melodies and chord progressions with AI assistance. Offers free and paid plans.

music.name: Jukedeck
music.description: Creates royalty-free background music for videos, presentations, and other creative projects. Offers free and paid plans.

music.name: WavTool
music.description: Uses AI to generate musical pieces, sound effects, and MIDI files based on user prompts. Offers a limited number of free daily prompts, with paid plans for extended functionalities.

music.name: Brain.fm
music.description: Creates AI-generated music designed to improve focus, relaxation, and sleep. Offers free trials and paid subscriptions.

music.name: Magenta Studio
music.description: A collection of open-source tools and libraries developed by Google AI for music generation and experimentation. Free to use.

music.name: Orb Producer Suite
music.description: A suite of AI-powered music production tools for composing, arranging, mixing, and mastering music. Offers paid subscriptions.

music.name: Asskgpt (Beta)
music.description: A large language model from OpenAI that can be used for various creative tasks, including generating lyrics, song titles, and melodies. Free to use during the beta testing phase.

music.name: The Bach Doodle (Google AI)
music.description: An interactive experiment by Google AI that allows users to compose music in the style of Bach using a simple interface. Free to use.

music.name: Murf
music.description: Uses AI to generate realistic human voices for audiobooks, podcasts, and other creative projects. Offers free trials and paid subscriptions.

music.name: Amper Music** (similar service)
music.description: Another AI music generation platform offering audio creation in various styles and moods. Provides free trials and paid subscriptions.

music.name: HiFi SONG
music.description: An AI-powered tool for creating and customizing royalty-free background music. Offers free trials and paid subscriptions.

video.name: Synthesia
video.description: Creates realistic AI-powered videos with customizable avatars that speak your script. Offers paid subscriptions.

video.name: Colossyan
video.description: Generates high-quality text-to-video content with a focus on explainer videos and product demos. Offers paid subscriptions.

video.name: D-ID
video.description: Specializes in video reanimation, allowing you to bring archival footage or still images to life with AI-driven lip-syncing. Offers paid subscriptions.

video.name: Pictory
video.description: Transforms blog posts, articles, or scripts into engaging social media videos with AI image and text selection. Offers free and paid plans.

video.name: Descript
video.description: Enables video editing through text transcription, making it easy to adjust content and add narration. Offers free and paid plans.

video.name: Wondershare Filmora
video.description: Video editing software with various AI features for object removal, background replacement, and intelligent scene optimization. Offers free and paid plans.

video.name: Runway
video.description: An open-source platform for experimenting with generative AI tools, including video effects and editing functionalities. Offers free and paid plans.

video.name: Peech
video.description: Creates marketing and explainer videos with AI-powered text-to-speech narration and character animation. Offers free and paid plans.

video.name: InVideo
video.description: A comprehensive video creation platform with AI features for generating intros, outros, and social media video formats. Offers free and paid plans.

video.name: Fliki
video.description: Tailored towards creating short and engaging social media videos using AI for text animation, editing, and music selection. Offers free and paid plans.

video.name: Visla
video.description: Generates videos from a script, allowing for customization of video style, voiceover, and music. Offers paid subscriptions.

video.name: Opus Clip
video.description: Specializes in repurposing long-form video content into snackable social media clips using AI for scene detection and editing. Offers paid subscriptions.

video.name: DALL-E 2 (OpenAI)
video.description: While not specifically a video tool, DALL-E 2's ability to generate creative images can be a starting point for video concepts. Currently in closed beta.

video.name: Midjourney
video.description: Similar to DALL-E 2, Midjourney's image generation capabilities can inspire video ideas. Operates through a waitlist system and offers paid subscriptions.

video.name: Dream by WOMBO
video.description: Offers a user-friendly interface for generating creative images and artwork based on text prompts. Free and paid plans available.

video.name: Nightcafe Creator
video.description: Provides a range of customization options for creating both abstract and realistic images using text descriptions. Free and paid plans available.

video.name: Artbreeder
video.description: Platform for creating and exploring artistic variations of images using machine learning. Free to use with limitations, paid plans for extended functionalities.

video.name: Magenta Studio
video.description: A collection of open-source tools and libraries developed by Google AI for various creative tasks, including potential video applications. Free to use.

ppt.name: Beautiful.ai
ppt.description: Creates visually stunning presentations with AI-powered design suggestions and smart layouts. Offers free and paid plans.

ppt.name: Simplified's AI Presentation Maker
ppt.description: Uses AI to generate slide content and design elements based on your text input. Offers free and paid plans.

ppt.name: Slidebean
ppt.description: Provides AI-powered templates and coaching tools to help you create professional presentations quickly. Offers free and paid plans.

ppt.name: Designs.ai
ppt.description: An AI design platform offering presentation creation tools with automated layouts, image suggestions, and branding integration. Offers free and paid plans.

ppt.name: Pitch
ppt.description: Creates data-driven presentations with AI-powered insights and storytelling guidance. Offers paid subscriptions.

ppt.name: Presentations.ai
ppt.description: An AI presentation platform focusing on data visualization and storytelling. Offers free trials and paid subscriptions.

ppt.name: Kroma.ai
ppt.description: Specializes in creating presentations from data using AI. Offers data visualization tools and storytelling features. Offers paid subscriptions.

ppt.name: Tome
ppt.description: Emphasizes AI-powered text-to-slide functionality, generating presentations from your written content. Offers free trials and paid subscriptions.

ppt.name: DeckRobot
ppt.description: An AI presentation assistant that helps with content creation, design, and delivery using machine learning algorithms. Offers paid subscriptions.

ppt.name: Canva
ppt.description: A popular design platform with built-in AI features for suggesting layouts, images, and presentations templates. Offers free and paid plans.

ppt.name: Microsoft PowerPoint (with Microsoft 365 Copilot)
ppt.description: Microsoft PowerPoint offers an AI assistant called Copilot (currently in development) that suggests design elements and content based on your input. Part of Microsoft 365 subscription.

ppt.name: Visme
ppt.description: A comprehensive design platform with AI-powered features for creating presentations, infographics, and other visual content. Offers free and paid plans.

ppt.name: Prezi
ppt.description: Presentation software known for its non-linear canvas. Offers AI-powered tools for storytelling and audience engagement. Offers free and paid plans.

ppt.name: Haiku Deck
ppt.description: Presentation creation platform with a focus on simplicity and storytelling. Offers AI-powered suggestions for visuals and text. Offers free and paid plans.

ppt.name: Lumen5
ppt.description: Creates video presentations from text and media using AI. Offers free and paid plans.

ppt.name: Moovly
ppt.description: An animation and video creation platform with AI features for generating presentations with motion graphics and interactivity. Offers free and paid plans.

ppt.name: Powtoon
ppt.description: Offers tools for creating animated presentations and explainer videos with AI-powered features for design and storytelling. Provides free and paid plans.

prompt.name: ChatGPT (OpenAI)
prompt.description: A large language model from OpenAI that can be used for various creative tasks, including generating different creative text formats, translating languages, writing different kinds of creative content, and answering your questions in an informative way. Currently in beta testing.

prompt.name: Bard (Google AI)
prompt.description: A factual language model from Google AI, capable of generating different creative text formats, translating languages, writing different kinds of creative content, and answering your questions in an informative way. Still under development, not publicly available yet.

prompt.name: Jasper
prompt.description: A commercial AI writing assistant that helps with marketing copy, blog posts, website content, and other creative writing tasks. Offers paid subscriptions.

prompt.name: Rytr
prompt.description: An affordable AI writing assistant offering a variety of features for creating blog posts, social media content, product descriptions, and more. Provides free and paid plans.

prompt.name: Writesonic
prompt.description: An AI writing tool with features for generating different creative text formats, long-form content, marketing copy, and other writing needs. Offers free and paid plans.

prompt.name: Copy AI
prompt.description: An AI copywriting tool that assists with marketing copy, sales content, website copy, and other writing tasks. Offers free and paid plans.

prompt.name: Midjourney
prompt.description: An AI image generation platform that uses text prompts to create unique and creative images. Operates through a waitlist system and offers paid subscriptions.

prompt.name: DALL-E 2 (OpenAI)
prompt.description: A powerful AI image generation system from OpenAI, capable of creating realistic and creative images based on text descriptions. Currently in closed beta.

prompt.name: Nightcafe Creator
prompt.description: Provides a user-friendly interface for generating creative images and artwork based on text prompts. Offers free and paid plans.

prompt.name: Dream by WOMBO
prompt.description: Offers a user-friendly interface for generating creative images and artwork based on text prompts. Free and paid plans available.

prompt.name: Artbreeder
prompt.description: Platform for creating and exploring artistic variations of images using machine learning. Free to use with limitations, paid plans for extended functionalities.

prompt.name: Imagen (Google AI)
prompt.description: A powerful image generation system by Google AI, capable of creating high-fidelity images from textual descriptions. Still under research, not publicly available yet.

prompt.name: MuseNet (Google AI)
prompt.description: A generative music model from Google AI that can create music based on text prompts or musical styles. Still under development, not publicly available yet.

prompt.name: Jukebox (OpenAI)
prompt.description: An AI system by OpenAI that can generate music in various styles based on text descriptions. Currently in closed beta.

prompt.name: Amper Music** (similar service)
prompt.description: An AI music generation platform offering audio creation in various styles and moods based on user input. Provides free trials and paid subscriptions.
